medical_history.chief_complaint: Gastric tumor found during routine physical examination endoscopy.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The tumor was detected during a routine examination; the patient did not report nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, or any other significant symptoms. There were no specific aggravating or relieving factors noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient has a ten-year history of hypertension effectively controlled with anti-hypertensive medications.
